title: IRefPlaneFeatureData.Distance
description: Gets or sets the distance, in meters, to offset the reference plane feature.
returns: Distance, in radians, to offset the reference plane
remarks:
IMPORTANT:
Reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2010 or later are constraint based; reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2009 or earlier are not. See the
Remarks
section in the
IRefPlaneFeatureData interface
topic for details about reference planes and this interface.

examples.title: Modify Plane by Editing Its Definition (VBA)
